QuestData.Title: Northbound
QuestData.Description:
The quilboar kidnapped the rest of the expedition and took them to the north.
I heard mention of needing more sacrifices for some sort of ritual...
Please, you must rescue them! Captain Garrick's son was part of our group. He swore his mother would save us!
QuestData.LogDescription: Scout northward and find Austin Huxworth.
QuestData.RewardText: I've got some good news and some very, very bad news.
